name: Royal College of Physicians
goal: The Royal College of Physicians is a British professional body dedicated to improving the practice of medicine, chiefly through the accreditation of physicians by examination.
interests: Consumers, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
•Alcohol
•Nutrition & obesity
•Tobacco control
•Quality of cross border healthcare
•Training and health workforce issues
•eHealth and health informatics
•Research and data protection
•International trade and health
